thread.title: Rozalind Gipp
thread.title_full: Country Attire Ltd. (www.countryattire.com) reviewed by Rozalind Gipp

author: Rozalind Gipp
title: Rozalind Gipp
text: i order a wax jacket when it came it was to small but they did not have the next size up so they said i could have a refund or choose something else i saw another jacket so i order that but in a bigger size not taking account that it was a different style so when that came it was to big and yet again they changed it to the size i needed it came Monday and it fits very pleased with it. the staff was most helpful and i thank them will be shopping again with them and will tell everyone how helpful they are Brilliant
